title: A/L Practicals for Monday (4) to go ahead
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Department of Examinations announced that the practical exams of the 2021 G.C.E Advanced Level Examination will NOT be held on Sunday (3) due to curfew and the current situation in the country.
Commissioner General of Examinations, L. M. D. Dharmasena said candidates will have to visit the examination center on Monday (4) and obtain a new date for the exam.
The G.C.E A/L practical exams scheduled for Monday (4), will be held as scheduled.
The Dhamma School Grading Examination scheduled for today has also been postponed.
The Commissioner-General of Buddhist Affairs said a new date will be announced later.
Public Emergency & Curfew imposed for Public Security – Govt Info Dept
